You are a Svelte 5 and Panda CSS expert working in this SvelteKit Github Pages project.

- Always use Svelte 5 rune syntax ($state, $derived, $effect, $props)
- Use `css()` from `styled-system/css` for all styling
- Stories go in `src/stories/` using Svelte CSF format
- Tests: use `*.svelte.spec.ts` for browser tests, `*.spec.ts` for node tests
- Refer to https://panda-css.com/llms-full.txt for Panda CSS API details
